post:
Hello guys!

We are introducing a new brand home page for our NAT VPS services. **https://NatVPS.NET**  :) 
Going forward all our NAT services will be promoted under this, sharing updates, guides, etc. related to nat services at https://natvps.net. 
Billing/management remains at our original web horizon s billing panel.
<center>
![](https://natvps.net/assets/img/logo/logo2_footer.png "")
</center>

We have services at 9 Global Locations. 

<br>

Currently Available Locations -    

Asia-Pacific - **Singapore** 🇸🇬 | **Hong Kong** 🇭🇰 

Europe - **Netherlands** 🇳🇱 | **Switzerland** 🇨🇭 | **Poland** 🇵🇱

America - **Los Angeles, US** 🇺🇸 | **New York, US** 🇺🇸

------------------------------------

<br>
> 
> **VPS-NAT256 - $7 per YEAR**
> 
> 256MB RAM 
> 4GB NVMe/SSD disk space
> 1 CPU Core(s) (fair share)
> /80 IPv6 + NAT IPv4 + Domain Forwarding(IPv4 port 80/443)
> 500GB transfer @1Gbps per month, then reduced speed.
> [**Order Link Singapore**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/nat/?group_id=23&pricing_id=301 "**Order Link Singapore**") 🇸🇬
> [**Order Link Hong Kong**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/nat/?group_id=41&pricing_id=438 "**Order Link Hong Kong**") 🇭🇰 [Setup 72 hours from order confirmation]
> [**Order Link Switzerland**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/nat/?group_id=27&pricing_id=327 "**Order Link Switzerland**") 🇨🇭 [Setup 72 hours from order confirmation]
> [**Order Link Netherlands**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/nat/?group_id=24&pricing_id=282 "**Order Link Netherlands**") 🇳🇱
> [**Order Link Poland**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/nat/?group_id=47&pricing_id=489 "**Order Link Poland**") 🇵🇱
> [**Order Link New York**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/nat/?group_id=25&pricing_id=274 "**Order Link New York**") 🇺🇸
> [**Order Link Los Angleles**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/nat/?group_id=26&pricing_id=296 "**Order Link Los Angleles**") 🇺🇸

<br>

All higher plans: [**See here**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/index/nat "**See here**")

====Please turn OFF PROXY / VPN while ORDERING.====
Please use correct account details, else the order might be held for verification.

<br>

**Common Use Cases** - creative ideas, feel free to add your own!

* Private VPN Server - Most methods including OpenVPN / Wireguard can be used, dual IPv4+IPv6 connectivity.

* VoIP Server - Create your own VoIP setup using Teamspeak, Mumble etc.

* Remote Terminal - A simple remote terminal with root access, testing scripts & other stuff.

* Private AdBlocking Proxy - Ad-blocking VPN & private proxy server using AdGuard Home.

* Personal Hobby Sites - Host a full-fledged website (w any CMS like WordPress, Ghost etc) using Domain Forwarding on port 80 & 443.

<br>

**Some Cool Guides** -  B) 
[**Setup AdGuard Home on a NAT VPS**](https://webhorizon.in/blog/2021/04/setup-adguard-home-on-nat-vps/ "**Setup AdGuard Home on a NAT VPS**")

[**Setup Wireguard on a NAT VPS**](https://webhorizon.in/blog/2021/04/setup-wireguard-on-a-nat-vps/ "Setup Wireguard on a NAT VPS")




**Frequently ask questions**

> **I don't have IPv6, can I still use this service ?**
Yes you can! We include 20 usable ports + 1 SSH port for IPv4 access.
We also allow Domain Forwarding setup on IPv4 port 80 & 443. 

> **Support tun/tap/fuse ?**
Yes, can be enabled from control panel.

> **What is hostname / Invalid hostname**
Our system expects hostname in domain format, it needs not be an actual domain. 
example - sample.com

> **Available payment methods**
Crypto, CC via Stripe, PayPal, etc.
Also BCH & XMR payments are supported.

> **Docker Support**
Docker works, recommended 512MB plan at least.
> **Test IPs**
Please PM for test IPs. 

<br>



Feel free to ask any questions you might have :)
